errors.banned: You're banned from using this website.

messages.domain_added: The domain has been added successfully.
messages.password_changed: Your password has been changed successfully.
messages.verification_sent: A verification email has been sent.
messages.reset_sent: If the email address exists, a reset password email will be sent to it.

messages.report_thanks: Thanks for the report, we'll take actions shortly.
messages.change_email_sent: A verification link has been sent to the requested email address.

email.verify_greeting: Thanks for creating an account on {{domain}}.
email.verify_text: Please verify your email address using the link below.
email.reset_text: A password reset has been requested for your account.
email.reset_instruction: Please click on the button below to reset your password. There's no need to take any action if you didn't request this.
email.change_email_text: A request has been made to change your email address.
email.change_email_verify_text: Please verify your new email address using the link below.

pages.banned_title: Link has been banned and removed because of malware or scam.
pages.banned_report: If you noticed a malware/scam link shortened by {{domain}}, send us a report.
pages.verified: Your account has been verified. Redirecting to homepage...
pages.delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
